model

Class DataAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DataAnalysis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Observer

    public class DataAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, Observable
    This class is an intermediary class for data analysis. It receives data from gameRecorder using the Observer pattern and throws that data into PredictionModel objects. It then grabs predicted events from PredictionModel objects and then throws them up to its observer (AnalysisView).
    Author:
    Craig Thomson

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(long queryTimeInMS)
        Schedule the GameRecorder class to start getting data. It will start once the game has started.

      • start

        public void start()

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.Object obj)
        Update method for this Observer. It receives EventLists from GameRecorder, passes data from it into the models. It then polls each model for any events and adds them to it's list if any exist
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
